aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Shubham Kumar
aboutData.subtitle: Software Developer
aboutData.text: I am a skilled front-end developer with 3 years of experience designing, building, and maintaining front-end web applications. I have successfully achieved a 20% improvement in page load speed, leading to increased website conversion rates. By overseeing the adoption of a new front-end development system, I contributed to a 20% improvement in website performance and a 15% reduction in development time. I consistently deliver projects on schedule and within budget while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams

services.title: WEBSITE DESIGN
services.text: Web design and development technology has evolved significantly over the years. Today, building a successful website requires a diverse set of tools and expertise to create effective and engaging digital experiences.

services.title: MOBILE APPS
services.text: App development is crucial for companies to remain relevant across various devices. To facilitate seamless customer interactions, businesses should invest in creating user-friendly, high-quality apps that enable easy connectivity through multiple devices.

services.title: E-COMMERCE
services.text: Are you searching the web? If you're eager to take the next step, now is the perfect time to find an e-commerce website development company and get a personalized website tailored to your needs.

services.title: RESPONSIVE DESIGN
services.text: Do you truly understand what responsive design is? Nearly every new client now requests a mobile-friendly version of their website. With the increasing number of mobile users worldwide, having a responsive design has become essential and highly practical.

services.title: CMS
services.text: With the world moving towards social, mobile, and cloud platforms, your business needs a powerful content management system. Platforms like WordPress, Shopify, and Magento are now vital for managing a strong online presence. They form the backbone of modern business brands worldwide.

services.title: CRM DEVELOPMENT
services.text: What is CRM development and why is it crucial for businesses? CRM applications are essential tools for building customer relationships by centralizing and managing various records in one place. This centralized approach helps businesses maintain organized and effective customer interactions.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: As a skilled front-end developer with 3 years of experience, I specialize in designing, building, and maintaining high-performance web applications. My work has led to a 20% improvement in page load speed and a significant boost in website conversion rates. I successfully managed the adoption of a new development system, resulting in a 20% enhancement in website performance and a 15% reduction in development time. My ability to deliver projects on time and within budget, while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams, demonstrates my commitment to excellence in front-end development.

Richard Miles
informations.text: I had the pleasure of working with Shubham on a recent project, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Their attention to detail, technical expertise, and timely communication exceeded my expectations. [Freelancer's Name] was proactive in addressing issues and offered valuable suggestions to improve the project. I highly recommend them for any complex and high-stakes work

informations.title: Vesta Shufelt
informations.text: Working with Shubham was a fantastic experience. They were professional, reliable, and delivered high-quality work on time. Their ability to understand and implement requirements was impressive, and they provided regular updates throughout the project. I would definitely work with Shubham again and recommend them to others looking for a dedicated freelancer!

informations.title: Joseph Alves
informations.text: I hired Shubham for a project that required both technical skills and creative problem-solving. They delivered exceptional results, showing great skill and creativity. Shubham was always open to feedback and made revisions promptly. Their work added significant value to our project, and I am very satisfied with their contributions

informations.title: Richard Miles
informations.text: I had a positive experience working with Shubham. They offered great value for money by delivering high-quality work within budget and on time. Shubham was easy to communicate with and took the time to understand my requirements thoroughly. I would recommend them for anyone seeking a freelancer who provides excellent service at a reasonable price.
